rdf:Description.dcterms:creator: mgarrish
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: This RDF vocabulary defines a set of terms relating to accessible descriptions.
rdf:Description.dcterms:title: DIAGRAM Descriptions Vocabulary

rdf:Bag.dcterms:title: Description Metadata
rdf:Bag.dcterms:description: Standard terms used for defining metadata about a description.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: descriptionQuality
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A quality rating for the description.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: targetAge
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The target age of the reader.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: targetGrade
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Target school grade level of the reader.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: currentVersion
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A URI pointing to the location where the most current version of the description can be found.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thisVersion
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A URI pointing to the location where the currently referenced description can be found.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: previousVersion
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A URI pointing to the location where the previous version of the description can be found.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alternateVersion
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A URI pointing to the location where an alternative version is available.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: repository
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A URI pointing to a repository of descriptions.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: queryConcept
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A term relevant to the current description that can be used to query a repository for additional information.
